title: 我下载了一个mod,是压缩包类型的,我不会安装,所以来询问!!请各位帮个忙~!!!谢谢
txt_content:
我下面就图片和文字来把官方教程放出来,帮我看看怎么装,然后教一下我就好了额,谢谢

1.官方的教程
   




QQ图片20190904195218.png (135.15 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-9-4 19:53 上传





     The first thing to do is make sure you installed Minecraft Forge.
                Download the Togglesprint/Sneak + Elytramovement Mod below or from anywhere, make sure the mod is compatible with the version of Forge installed.
                  Locate the Minecraft Application Folder:
On Windows open Run from the start menu, type %appdata%\.minecraft\ and click Run.On MAC OS X open finder, hold down ALT and click Go then Library in the top menu bar. Open the folder Application Support and look for minecraft.
                 Place Togglesprint/Sneak + Elytramovement into your Mods folder. If you don’t have one, create it now.


              Now, just launch Minecraft with Forge profile!


2.这是我下载的压缩包里面的文件

3.这是压缩包里面那个txt文件(好像也是教程)




QQ图片20190904195234.png (38.69 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-9-4 19:53 上传







Created by MCgaming4k The contained Mods are mcp-mods.
 You have to use them in another way than forge-mods.  Copy the *.class files into the 1.9 minecraft.jar. 
The Togglesneak and Togglesprint are incompartible with each other. Use the "togglesprint + elytramovement" instat. Don't rename any files.




请大家帮下我这个电脑白痴...谢谢

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content:
Place Togglesprint/Sneak + Elytramovement into your Mods folder. If you don’t have one, create it now.
真正有用的就这句，把mod放到mods文件夹下，有一些mod就是zip格式的。
外国人话多+你英语不行的恶果。
